Key Match Events: Georgia scored in the second minute through Khvicha Kvaratskhelia
Georges Mikautadze converted a second-half penalty
Post-Match Reflections: Georgia's historic victory means they finish third behind Turkey
Portugal will face Slovenia in the round of 16 on Monday evening
Miscellaneous Highlights: Georgia reached Euro 2024 — their first-ever appearance at a major tournament
Others: Cristiano Ronaldo started the game but was substituted on 66 minutes with only a booking to show for his efforts
Georgia manager Willy Sagnol told The Athletic they were going ‘to play with ambition'
